verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> that came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> concerning all the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> at <S%H4024>Migdol,<s%> and at <S%H8471>Tahpanhes,<s%> and at <S%H5297>Memphis,<s%> and in the <S%H776>country<s%> of <S%H6624>Pathros,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> You have <S%H7200>seen<s%> all the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that I have <S%H935>brought<s%> on <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and on all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> and <S%H3117>behold,<s%> this day they are a <S%H2723>desolation,<s%> and no man dwells <S%H3427>therein,<s%>

<S%H6440>because<s%> of their <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> which they have <S%H6213>committed<s%> to provoke me to <S%H3707>anger,<s%> in that they <S%H3212>went<s%> to burn <S%H6999>incense,<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> that they <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know, neither <S%H1>they,<s%> nor you, nor your fathers.

However I <S%H7971>sent<s%> to you all my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> rising up <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H7971>sending<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> saying, <S%H6213>Oh,<s%> don't do this <S%H8441>abominable<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> that I <S%H8130>hate.<s%>

But they <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen, nor <S%H5186>inclined<s%> their <S%H241>ear<s%> to <S%H7725>turn<s%> from their <S%H7451>wickedness,<s%> to burn no <S%H6999>incense<s%> to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%>

Therefore my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> and my <S%H639>anger<s%> was poured <S%H5413>forth,<s%> and was <S%H1197>kindled<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and they are <S%H2723>wasted<s%> and <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> as it is this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Therefore now thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> Why do you <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> against your own <S%H5315>souls,<s%> to cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from yourselves <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H5768>infant<s%> and <S%H3243>nursing<s%> child <S%H8432>out<s%> of the midst of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> to <S%H3498>leave<s%> yourselves none <S%H7611>remaining;<s%>

in that you provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with the <S%H4639>works<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands,<s%> burning <S%H6999>incense<s%> to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> where you have <S%H935>gone<s%> to <S%H1481>live;<s%> that you may be cut <S%H3772>off,<s%> and that you may be a <S%H7045>curse<s%> and a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> among all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth?<s%>

Have you <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of their <S%H802>wives,<s%> and your own <S%H7451>wickedness,<s%> and the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of your <S%H802>wives<s%> which they <S%H6213>committed<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem?<s%>

They are not <S%H1792>humbled<s%> even to this <S%H3117>day,<s%> neither have they <S%H3372>feared,<s%> nor <S%H1980>walked<s%> in my <S%H8451>law,<s%> nor in my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> that I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you and <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H7760>Behold,<s%> I will set my <S%H6440>face<s%> against you for <S%H7451>evil,<s%> even to cut <S%H3772>off<s%> all <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

I will <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> that have <S%H7760>set<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>live<s%> <S%H8552>there,<s%> and they shall all be consumed; in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall they <S%H5307>fall;<s%> they shall be <S%H8552>consumed<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> and by the <S%H7458>famine;<s%> they shall <S%H4191>die,<s%> from the <S%H6996>least<s%> even to the <S%H1419>greatest,<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> and by the <S%H7458>famine;<s%> and they shall be an <S%H423>object<s%> of <S%H8047>horror,<s%> an astonishment, and a <S%H7045>curse,<s%> and a <S%H2781>reproach.<s%>

For I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> those who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> as I have <S%H6485>punished<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> by the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and by the <S%H1698>pestilence;<s%>

so that none of the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> who have <S%H935>gone<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>live<s%> <S%H6412>there,<s%> shall escape or be <S%H8300>left,<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> to which they <S%H5375>have<s%> a <S%H5315>desire<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H7725>there:<s%> for none shall return save such as shall <S%H6405>escape.<s%>

Then all the <S%H582>men<s%> who <S%H3045>knew<s%> that their <S%H802>wives<s%> burned <S%H6999>incense<s%> to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and all the <S%H802>women<s%> who stood <S%H5975>by,<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6951>assembly,<s%> even all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> in <S%H6624>Pathros,<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
As for the <S%H1697>word<s%> that you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to us in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> we will not listen to <S%H8085>you.<s%>

But we will <S%H6213>certainly<s%> <S%H6213>perform<s%> every <S%H1697>word<s%> that is gone <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of our <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> to burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> to the <S%H4446>queen<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and to pour <S%H5258>out<s%> drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> to <S%H6213>her,<s%> as we have done, we and our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> our <S%H4428>kings<s%> and our <S%H8269>princes,<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> for then had we <S%H7646>plenty<s%> of <S%H3899>food,<s%> and were <S%H2896>well,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> no <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

But since we left <S%H2308>off<s%> burning <S%H6999>incense<s%> to the <S%H4446>queen<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and pouring <S%H5258>out<s%> drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> to <S%H2637>her,<s%> we have wanted all <S%H8552>things,<s%> and have been consumed by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> and by the <S%H7458>famine.<s%>

When we burned <S%H6999>incense<s%> to the <S%H4446>queen<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and poured <S%H5258>out<s%> drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> to <S%H6213>her,<s%> did we make her <S%H3561>cakes<s%> to <S%H6087>worship<s%> <S%H5258>her,<s%> and pour out drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> to <S%H1107>her,<s%> without our <S%H582>husbands?<s%>

Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> to the <S%H1397>men,<s%> and to the <S%H802>women,<s%> even to all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who had given him an <S%H1697>answer,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

The <S%H7002>incense<s%> that you <S%H6999>burned<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> you and your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> your <S%H4428>kings<s%> and your <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3068>didn't<s%> Yahweh <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H5927>them,<s%> and didn't it come into his <S%H3820>mind?<s%>

so that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> no longer <S%H5375>bear,<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of your <S%H4611>doings,<s%> and <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> which you have <S%H6213>committed;<s%> therefore your <S%H776>land<s%> has become a <S%H2723>desolation,<s%> and an <S%H8047>astonishment,<s%> and a <S%H7045>curse,<s%> without <S%H3427>inhabitant,<s%> as it is this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H6440>Because<s%> you have burned <S%H6999>incense,<s%> and because you have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and have not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> nor <S%H1980>walked<s%> in his <S%H8451>law,<s%> nor in his <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> nor in his <S%H5715>testimonies;<s%> therefore this <S%H7451>evil<s%> has <S%H7122>happened<s%> to <S%H3117>you,<s%> as it is this day.

Moreover <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and to all the <S%H802>women,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> all <S%H3063>Judah<s%> who are in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> You and your <S%H802>wives<s%> have both <S%H1696>spoken<s%> with your <S%H6310>mouths,<s%> and with your <S%H3027>hands<s%> have <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> <S%H559>it,<s%> saying, We will <S%H6213>surely<s%> <S%H6213>perform<s%> our <S%H5088>vows<s%> that we have <S%H5087>vowed,<s%> to burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> to the <S%H4446>queen<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and to pour <S%H5258>out<s%> drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> to <S%H6965>her:<s%> establish <S%H6965>then<s%> your <S%H5088>vows,<s%> <S%H6213>and<s%> <S%H6213>perform<s%> your <S%H5088>vows.<s%>

Therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> all <S%H3063>Judah<s%> who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> <S%H7650>Behold,<s%> I have sworn by my <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that my <S%H8034>name<s%> shall no more be <S%H7121>named<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of any <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> As the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2416>lives.<s%>

<S%H8245>Behold,<s%> I watch over them for <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and not for <S%H2896>good;<s%> and all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> who are in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall be <S%H8552>consumed<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> and by the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> until they are all <S%H3615>gone.<s%>

Those who <S%H6412>escape<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall return <S%H7725>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H4962>few<s%> in <S%H4557>number;<s%> and all the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> who have <S%H935>gone<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>live<s%> <S%H3045>there,<s%> shall know whose <S%H1697>word<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand,<s%> mine, or theirs.

This shall be the <S%H226>sign<s%> to <S%H5002>you,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> you in this <S%H4725>place,<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that my <S%H1697>words<s%> shall <S%H6965>surely<s%> <S%H6965>stand<s%> against you for <S%H7451>evil:<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H5414>Behold,<s%> I will give Pharaoh <S%H6548>Hophra<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> his <S%H5315>life;<s%> as I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> who was his <S%H341>enemy,<s%> and <S%H1245>sought<s%> his <S%H5315>life.<s%>
